channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Read: I posted this in client help but I have waited around 3-5 hours and have got no help because no one hardly goes to that area.
Hey Everyone, Basically my cache downloads but downloads wrong it downloads it like this.
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/560/wrongcachedownloading.png/
All the cache files download in the zip file contained in the cache and the main cache files are 0kb but if you open up the zip folder contained in the cache has all the files so people have to extract it which would be too hard for some people as they can be lazy and just quit.
This is how I uploaded it on Dropbox and I did do add to archive before people ask.
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/829/dropboxa.png/
That is how I uploaded the files on dropbox basically a zipped archive containing the files.
I don't know what the problem is.
Please Help.
Thanks, I Rushed You

item.title: Help Please

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Write a unzip method.

Read full topic

ight, if it doesn’t work then i guess you need to wait for someone else, but like I said, it always works for me.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @I_Rushed_You I Rushed You
item.description:
@I_Rushed_You wrote:

What do you mean tell them what do to and are you sure about rar because I am sure client’s only extract the zip file because in my client it says mycachename.zip to be the name of cache no mycachename.rar

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Houston Houston
item.description:
@Houston wrote:

Try uploading it to mediafire. But don’t make it zipped but keep it .rar , and explain to them how to extract it, for those who do not know how. Thats all I know to tell ya.

Read full topic
